usage: Used for strength training, resistance exercises, and fitness workouts at home, in classes, or in a gym setting.
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training, ideal for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
Cast iron construction with neoprene coating for durability, safety, and a non-slip grip
Printed weight number on each end cap and color coded for quick identification
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
NON TOXIC guarantee (as shown on seal)
ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene-style coating sit on a white surface. Each end cap shows the KAKSS logo and clear 1 KG marking in white for easy ID. The coated metal build and flat sides give a solid, non-slip feel and prevent rolling.
target_audience: Home exercisers, fitness enthusiasts, and beginners looking for light hand weights for workouts, classes, or home gyms.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training -Pink
